1. SOCCER - This can be considered an "Organization" entity as it refers to the international governing body for association football, FIFA (Fédération Internationale de Football Association).
2. ASIAN CUP - This is also an "Organization" entity, as it refers to the Asian Football Confederation (AFC) Asian Cup, a quadrennial international men's football championship of Asia.

Therefore, both "SOCCER" and "ASIAN CUP" can be identified as "Organization" entities in the given paragraph.
